body_html:
tf.Variable(weights, trainable=False) will maintain weights unchangeable during training.
Maybe this StackOverflow answer will help.
Further info about tf.Variable class see here.

tf.Variable(weights, trainable=False) will maintain weights unchangeable during training.
Maybe this StackOverflow answer will help.
Further info about tf.Variable class see here.
body:
tf.Variable(weights, trainable=False) will maintain weights unchangeable during training.
Maybe this [StackOverflow answer](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35298326/freeze-some-variables-scopes-in-tensorflow-stop-gradient-vs-passing-variables) will help.
Further info about [tf.Variable class see here](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#Variable).
